name: OGRE Systems
overview: Ogre Systems Inc. provides economic analysis and reserves management software, and related consulting services for the oil and gas industry. The company offers pyxis that is used to import production data, create forecasts, and run economic reports; pyxis Pro, which provides various components to offer an interfacing for performing various procedures; and pyxis Pro Global, an estimation, evaluation, and analysis program that provides infrastructure and tools for economic modelers to verify, audit, and consolidate economic models. It serves engineers, engineering technicians, land men, geologists, acquisitions departments, consultants, CEOs, and CFOs. Ogre Systems Inc. was formerly known as OGRE Partners, Ltd. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas with additional offices in Moscow, Russian Federation; Beijing, China; and Jakarta, Indonesia.
